item.title: English

item.description: Words antisemitism Antisemitism is [hostility] to, [prejudice] towards, or [discrimination] against [Jews]. Veteran [a person who has had long experience in a particular field] Gaff fc position ease box interval due 0 2.20 2 1.00 2022-03-26T21:42:26Z {{a large hook Servility {{an excessive willingness to serve or please others}} Laceration A deep cut or tear in skin or flesh Honorifics An honorific is a title that conveys esteem, courtesy, or respect for position or rank when used in addressing or referring to a person.
